## IDevice.connectionRemoved property

An observable which emits whenever an existing connection with the device has disconnected. If it was the last existing connection, [IDevice.onDisconnect](./jabra-js.idevice.ondisconnect.md) will also emit.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
connectionRemoved: Observable<IConnection>;
```
